titles.title: Hawaiian Homeownership Opportunity Act of 2013
To reauthorize the programs of the Department of Housing and Urban Development for housing assistance for Native Hawaiians.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: 1/14/2013--Introduced. Hawaiian Homeownership Opportunity Act of 2013 - Amends the Native American Housing Assistance and Self-Determination Act of 1996 and the Housing and Community Development Act of 1992 to extend through FY2017 the authorization of appropriations for housing assistance for Native Hawaiians and loan guarantees for Native Hawaiian housing.
